definition[0]: the order that something happens or exists in, or the order it is supposed to happen or exist in
example[0]: The questions should be asked in a logical sequence.
example[1]: Be careful to perform the actions in the correct sequence.
example[3]: The chapters may be studied out of sequence.
definition[1]: a series of related events, actions etc that happen or are done in a particular order
example[4]: Heâ€™s had a sequence of business failures.
example[5]: the sequence of events leading up to the war
definition[2]: one part of a story, film etc that deals with a single subject or action
example[6]: the dream sequence in the film
